mapper.select: SELECT c.type, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT a.usergroup_id) userGroupId FROM `t_usergroup_user_map` a inner join t_usergroup b on b.id=a.usergroup_id inner JOIN sys_role c on c.ROLE_ID=b.ROLE_ID and c.type='audit' where a.USERNAME=#{applyUserId} GROUP BY c.type

select count(1) from t_virtualmachine a
where exists (select 1 from cmp_workorder b where a.appNo=b.appNo and b.applyUserId=#{applicant})
where exists (select 1 from cmp_workorder b where a.appNo in ( SELECT c.BUSINESS_KEY_ FROM act_hi_procinst c INNER JOIN act_hi_actinst d on c.PROC_INST_ID_=d.PROC_INST_ID_ where d.ASSIGNEE_ in (select e.USERNAME from t_usergroup_user_map e where FIND_IN_SET(e.usergroup_id, #{audit}))))
select count(1) from t_hostmachine where type!='kvm'
select count(1) from t_hostmachine where type='kvm'

select count(1) from t_project
where USERNAME=#{applyUserId}

select count(1) from cmp_workorder
where applyUserId=#{applyUserId}
